version_description:
- option to view scanned text & translation in text view
- improve UI
- bugfixes

- option to view scanned text & translation in text view

- bugfixes

- can edit the translated text before sharing
- fix some UI bugs

- can edit the translated text before sharing
- fix some UI bugs

- fix a crash when open the app without internet connection
- move the Pinned Translations into home screen
- other UI improvements & bugfixes

- fix a crash when open the app without internet connection
- move the Pinned Translations into home screen
- other UI improvements & bugfixes

- introduce Premium subscription with 3-day free trial
- upgrade cloud vision API for better text recognition
- improve app stability

- introduce Premium subscription with 3-day free trial
- upgrade cloud vision API for better text recognition
- improve app stability

By default, Auto language detection is set
Fix some mistakes in Text
Bug fixes & minor stability improvements
Hope you enjoy it
